attributes.action: STOP INCREASES IN COUNCIL TAX VIA RE-VALUATION BASED ON YOUR VIEW AND OTHER IRRELEVANT CRITERIA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as this is already in the cost of a house as the STAMP DUTY. 
You pay STAMP DUTY on the value of your property and this is based on where you live and other metrics such as location, view, number of bedrooms etc.

If you overlook a park or greenspace your tax should be probably reduced as there are fewer street lights and Highway and domestic/residential services to pay for not More?

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters, they make the text hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
